column5: Recently returned from week in Ontario and have a rather large amount of tax assessed which is refundable. I forgot to pick up form at border and the websites I have visited have links to form but have an error when trying to pick up form. Any help will be appreciated. Thanks TLY

TLY: You can obtain the form at: http://www.ccra-adrc.gc.ca/E/pbg/gf/gst176/README.html There is a pamphlet to help establish your eligibility for claims at:http://www.ccra-adrc.gc.ca/E/pub/tg/rc4031/README.html
Make sure lodge owners mark on bill if you paid in american funds or they will try to pay you according to canadian funds, it happened to me and it won't happen again!
